org.kaaproject.kaa.client.context

Interface ExecutorContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractExecutorContext, SimpleExecutorContext, SingleThreadExecutorContext

    public interface ExecutorContext
    Responsible for creation of executor instances for SDK internal usage. Implementation should not manage created executor life-cycle. Executors will be stopped during GenericKaaClient.stop(), thus executor instances should not be cached in context or context should check shutdown status before return of cached value.
    Author:
    Andrew Shvayka

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExecutorService getApiExecutor()
      Executes user API calls to SDK client.
      ExecutorService getCallbackExecutor()
      Executes callback methods provided by SDK client user.
      ExecutorService getLifeCycleExecutor()
      Executes lifecycle events/commands of Kaa client
      ScheduledExecutorService getScheduledExecutor()
      Executes scheduled tasks(periodically if needed) as log upload
      void init()
      Initialize executors
      void stop()
      Stops executors

      • getApiExecutor

        ExecutorService getApiExecutor()

        Returns:
        the API executor

        Executes callback methods provided by SDK client user.
        Returns:

        ScheduledExecutorService getScheduledExecutor()
        Executes scheduled tasks(periodically if needed) as log upload
        Returns:
        the scheduled executor
